HELP_MSG:
Please, provide arguments. Usage example: 
node streams.js -a ActionName [-f FileName] 

 -a / --action  Mandatory. Action name: reverse|transform|outputFile|convertFromFile|convertToFile 
 -f / --file    File name 
 -h / --help    Print help message
OUTPUTFILE_MSG: Here is the content of file
NOFILE_MSG:
Existing file needed for this action.
Please provide filename after -f | --file key.
Use -h | --help key to see usage example.
CONVERTFILE_MSG: Converted CSV ready for using by path ./
